subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: With the apparently Barcelona-bound Cesc Fàbregas missing and Samir Nasri left out amid rumors he is about to join Manchester City, Arsenal rarely threatened to score in a scoreless tie at Newcastle.
snippet: With the apparently Barcelona-bound Cesc Fàbregas missing and Samir Nasri left out amid rumors he is about to join Manchester City, Arsenal rarely threatened to score in a scoreless tie at Newcastle.
